tgt_original: rāgo dveṣaśca mohaśca trayaite viṣamaṃ gatāḥ |  viṣatvamupayāntyeva viṣamatvena sevitāḥ |
amṛtatvaṃ punarye ca amṛtattvena sevitāḥ ||10 ||  punaścoktaṃ ratnakūṭasūtre - '
tadyathā kāśyapa |  ikṣukṣetreṣu śālikṣetreṣu saṃkarakūṭa upakārībhūto bhavati,
evameva yo bodhisattvasya kleśa saṃkarakūṭaḥ saḥ sarvajñatāyām upakārībhūto bhavati |
tadyathā kāśyapa mantrauṣadhiparigṛhītaṃ viṣaṃ na nighātayati evameva prajñopāyasamanvitobodhisattvaḥ |  kleśaviṣairna vinipātyate |
